version_description:
- добавлена поддержка iPad
- исправлено отображение объема Интернет-трафика в разделе "Затраты"
- улучшена стабильность работы приложения

- Code 073 added
- Problems fixed
- Design updated

- Code 073 added
- Problems fixed
- Design updated
- Fixed issue with app launch in iOS 10
- Fixed issue with tariff list displaying

- Updated interface design
- Shake&Win promo section added – useful gifts for app users
- Most frequently used functions are on homepage now
- Minor bugs fixed

1. Fixed critical problem with application crashes
2. Fixed bug with inaccurate balances information
3. Fixed localization issue
4. Stability and working speed improvements

- Cosmetic improvements
- Small bugs corrected

- Cosmetic improvements
- Small bugs corrected

1. We added new gifts to Shake&Win gift list.
2. We have picked the most suitable tariff plans for migration for every subscriber and combined them into "Recommended tariff plans" category.
3. Now you are able to order items from our shop directly from mobile application.
4. It has become easier to find lifecell offline shops – the location map is embedded in the menu.
Get ready for 4.5G reality!

- Increased device LTE support accuracy check.
- Work stability related error has been fixed.
- We have added new gifts to Shake&Win gift list.
The functionality of the mobile application is available to subscribers who migrated from another mobile communications operator in Ukraine.
-Fixed period selection error for expenses and payments sections
The functionality of the mobile application is available to subscribers who migrated from another mobile communications operator in Ukraine.

Meet the new version of My lifecell app!
-New modern design and user-friendly interface
-The app works much better and faster
-Convenient display of balances in the form of pie charts
-Instant support via messengers
-Finding the nearest lifecell store became easier with route planning functionality
Get gifts from Shake & Win!

"My lifecell" app works better now.

You will always remember the next payment date of your tariff plan. Just open the app!
We are grateful for your hints and feedback.

"My lifecell" app works better now.
We are grateful for your hints and feedback!
Authorization mechanism was updated. "My lifecell" app works better now.

- We have made a completely new Balance section and for your convenience added it to the home screen.
- Now it's even easier to keep track of the balances of gigabytes, minutes and SMS - you can customize which balances you want to see first.
- Many other improvements you can hardly see, but you can feel )

- We have made a completely new Balance section and for your convenience added it to the home screen.
- Now it's even easier to keep track of the balances of gigabytes, minutes and SMS - you can customize which balances you want to see first.
- Many other improvements you can hardly see, but you can feel )
Added functionality to reorder a service package. Improved application performance.

Improved the work of the app for corporate subscribers, updated the “Shop” section, added the functionality to activate the “Plus” service, improved the “Services” section, made the app even more beautiful.

Smilemeter - smile and get gigabytes!
Added functionality to order services for our loved ones in the Mobile Care section, as well as improved app performance.
Smilemeter promo campaign problem fixed
Исправлены ошибки, оптимизирована и улучшена работа приложения. Спасибо за ваши отзывы!
Welcome "My rewards" new section – all rewards and privileges for lifecell subscribers on one screen.
Bugs fixed, application performance optimized and improved. Thanks for your feedback!
